author: Wilmot Proviso
title: LGBT Community Furious After Trump Removes Sexuality From Census
text:
Liberals Attack Ivanka After She Posts Touching Photo of Her and Her Son on His Birthday 
“The Subjects Planned for the 2020 Census and American Community Survey report released today inadvertently listed sexual orientation and gender identity as a proposed topic in the appendix. This topic is not being proposed to Congress for the 2020 Census or American Community Survey,” the Census Bureau said in a statement, according to The Washington Times . 
They added that they weren’t included because there was no “federal need” for them. 
The questions weren’t asked in the 2010 Census, but the Department of Health and Human Services and the Department of Housing and Urban Development, then under control of the Obama administration, had asked for the questions to be included. Advertisement - story continues below 
Liberals, needless to say, were furious at the change of course under the Trump White House. 
“The Census Bureau is really missing an opportunity to serve the federal agencies and the American people,” Meghan Maury, director of the Criminal and Economic Justice Project at the National LGBTQ Task Force, said, adding that the government “can’t make the right choices about how to allocate those resources if they don’t have a sense of what the LGBTQ community looks like.” 
The Human Rights Campaign, another LGBT organization, also filed a Freedom of Information Act request with the Commerce Department, which oversees the Census, asking for documents relating to their communication with the Trump administration on the matter. 
Of course they did, because whenever something like this happens, it must be some sort of sinister conspiracy from the Trump administration. Probably at the behest of Vladimir Putin. Advertisement - story continues below
